channel.title: Height
channel.description:
C'mon, this is like the 2nd or 3rd post i've made...
Does anyone know the height mask?..
Cause you got the ID mask..
mask100var1 = id; ..
Delay mask?
mask100var2 = delay; ..
Now i need the mask that controls the height, of the variables above..
I've tried everything lmao. The stuff like out.writeWord(id);
will NOT work... Thats a completely different GFX.. [code] out.writeWord(id); [/code]
Causes that.
Ya ya, don't get me wrong, that does work... But it creates a completely different GFX, and it's not facing.
So you have one thats facing south, with the applied height.
And the facing gfx, at the set height.
I need something, that lets me control height of the following.. [code] mask100var1 = id; mask100var2 = delay; [/code]
And the only thing that might, is a mask...
So please.. Anyone know it?
Many thanks..

item.title: Height
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

C’mon, this is like the 2nd or 3rd post i’ve made…

Does anyone know the height mask?..

Cause you got the ID mask…

mask100var1 = id; …

Delay mask?

mask100var2 = delay; …

Now i need the mask that controls the height, of the variables above…

I’ve tried everything lmao. The stuff like out.writeWord(id);

will NOT work… Thats a completely different GFX…

out.writeWord(id);

Causes that.

Ya ya, don’t get me wrong, that does work… But it creates a completely different GFX, and it’s not facing.

So you have one thats facing south, with the applied height.

And the facing gfx, at the set height.

I need something, that lets me control height of the following…

mask100var1 = id;
mask100var2 = delay;

And the only thing that might, is a mask…

So please… Anyone know it?

Many thanks…
